org.aludratest.service.separatedfile.impl

Class DefaultSeparatedFileAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.aludratest.service.separatedfile.impl.DefaultSeparatedFileAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Action, Condition, Interaction, SeparatedFileCondition, SeparatedFileInteraction, SeparatedFileVerification, Verification

    public class DefaultSeparatedFileAction
extends Object
implements SeparatedFileInteraction, SeparatedFileVerification, SeparatedFileCondition
    Default implementation of the interfaces SeparatedFileInteraction, SeparatedFileVerification and SeparatedFileCondition.
    Author:
    Volker Bergmann
